author: Gunjita
text: "We are 1000+ Indian students stuck in the eastern part of Ukraine in Kharkiv. We are almost out of food and water supply and have to spent days and nights in the nearest metro station with a lack of movement. Please rescue us" says every Indian student stuck in Ukraine.

author: Gunjita
text: Wish you the happiest birthday @ShawnMendes ❤ You're an incredible singer and song writer but above all you're an amazing person. I wish you have a wonderful year in your wonderland!! https://t.co/Kei8sNe5Kp

author: Gunjita
text:
